article_title: Winter storm warning issued for Lancaster County; up to 8 inches of snow possible
article_text: Paula Wolf is a Lancaster Newspapers staff writer who covers real estate and local colleges and writes a weekly sports column, Wheelchair Quarterback. She can be reached at pwolf@lnpnews.com or (717) 291-8692. You can also follow @pywolf on Twitter.

article_metadata.news_keywords: , snow, weather forecast lancaster county, winter
article_metadata.author: PAULA WOLF | Staff Writer

og.description: The National Weather Service has issued a travel advisory from 1 a.m. overnight until 3 p.m. Monday afternoon.
